events.message: You travel north into frozen fields.  3 arctic rats think you are more delicious than the tubers you were sent to harvest.
events.success: You bring 3 rat pelts and 60 pounds of tubers home to an ecstatic village.
events.fail: The rats chase you home.  You pray to Khul that tubers remain there after you've regrouped.

events.message: Pleased with your work, the Chieftan orders you twice as far to harvest fallen nutritious pine cones.
Your village is attacked by a neighboring barbarian tribe!
The chieftan struggles to defend your wife from four murderers.
events.success: You crush their bones!  You are now the chieftan, and a widower.

events.message: You return to the camp of the bandits to repay their favor.
events.success: You are now the chieftan of two tribes.  You have your choice of all the wives.

events.message: The chieftans of two neighboring tribes challenge you simultaneously.
Lording over villages loses its taste.
You make your way into the Western wastes, seeking adventure.  Frost giants think to challenge your imperial rule.
On a mountaintop you speak the words that unleash a terrible curse.
The Dragon Algernon, unleashed by the curse, destroys your empire.  Smoldering with ash, soot, and blood, you resist.

end.message: You are Berserker.  Fame and fallow sway not your tides.  The earth trembles and sighs yet none stand before you.
